update report_goods_order set date = #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, finish_count = #{finishCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, medal_receive = #{medalReceive,jdbcType=INTEGER}, entity_receive = #{entityReceive,jdbcType=INTEGER}, online_order = #{onlineOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select DATE(sc.view_pic_time) as viewTime, COUNT(1) as count from (select * from score_cert where view_pic_time is not null group by player_phone,cert_name) as sc GROUP BY DATE(sc.view_pic_time)
SELECT DATE(os.part_time) as partTime,COUNT(1) as count FROM (SELECT * FROM open_score GROUP BY player_name,player_phone) as os GROUP BY DATE(os.part_time)
select DISTINCT(part_time) as partTime from open_score order by part_time asc LIMIT 0,1
